group_1.narration: In the middle of our second loop@of this life-sized board game…
We found ourselves at the shopping mall again.

group_1.textLeft: Huh, this place is…

group_1.textRight: I have a bad feeling about this.

group_1.narration: Attend the first sale of the New Year!@Reunite the pair of sisters who failed@to meet up with each other.@Skip three turns if you fail this mission.

group_1.textLeft: Here we go again…

group_1.textRight: I didn't think it was possible, but...
Anyways, we should go find the twins.

group_1.textLeft: Yeah, let's go.

group_1.textRight: Oh… It's you guys!
You're back already?

group_1.textLeft: Eh?

group_1.textRight: How did it go?@Did you find Tsukuyo?
And just to ask…
Why did you change into kimonos?

group_1.textLeft: Oh, um, well…
Hey, the way she's reacting to this is…

group_1.textRight: It seems as if the copies of us from the first@loop have already spoken to her.
And it looks like it's been some time since then.

group_1.textLeft: In other words, from her point of view,
we came back after promising her that we'd@look for Tsukuyo.
And we returned alone in our kimonos…@It would be pretty strange.

group_1.textRight: Perhaps the current versions of ourselves@were also originally nearby.
Still, we should continue our investigation.

group_1.textLeft: Yeah, this is kinda complicated.
Oh, um, don't worry about our kimonos!
It's kind of a long story.

group_1.textRight: I understand!@By the way, any luck finding Tsukuyo?

group_1.textLeft: Ah, yeah.
Ria ran into Tsukuyo and told us which way@she went.

group_1.textRight: Erm, so where is she?

group_1.textLeft: According to Ria…
You see that area over there on the left@after the escalator?
She should be right around the entrance.@[chara:210000:lipSynch_0][wait:0.8][chara:210000:lipSynch_1][chara:210000:face_mtn_ex_040.exp3.json][chara:210000:cheek_0]Although…

group_1.textRight: Is that so?!@Thanks, Madoka!
I have to go meet up with her right away!

group_1.textLeft: [chara:210000:effect_emotion_surprise_0][se:7226_shock]EH?! Ah, hang on a minute!
She's gone…
I was going to explain that she needs@to wait here.

group_1.textRight: This is bad.
Her twin sister…
She should already be on her way with our@copies from the previous time loop.

group_1.textLeft: They'll miss each other if we don't do@something soon!

group_1.textRight: Let's hurry after her.
